content: *if working a contrasting heel work r8 1ds p15 turn r15 change back to mc k21 do not turn r9 1ds k16 turn you should have 22 sts on each needle at this stage it is a good idea to try your sock on 3 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019 the leg resume knitting on both needles continue knitting every round until leg measures 8cm we love to see what you make from end of heel shaping or until 4cm less than desired tag your project on instagram using #makermakerstore length just make sure that you have enough yarn to finish the second sock maker maker store the cuff shop 2 162 lygon st optional change to smaller needles brunswick east vic 3057 now work desired ribbing for 4cm 0435 220 761 www makermakerstore com for 1x1 rib work k1 p1 to end info@makermakerstore com for 2x2 rib work k2 p2 to end you can follow us here www ravelry com/shops/maker-maker bind off all stitches using a stretchy bind off such as www facebook com/makermakerstore jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off or a decrease bind @makermaker_store off fasten_off and sew in your ends 4 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019
